DataElement.preferredName: Palliative Radiation Treatment Timepoint Asymptomatic Duration Without Steroid Maintenance Therapy Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to the timepoint of palliative radiation therapy and the period of time during which the patient is asymptomatic without maintenance steroid therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Palliative Radiation Therapy Timepoint Asymptomatic Duration Without Steroid Therapy Maintenance Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any radiation treatment done with the intent to relieve symptoms and reduce the suffering caused by the cancer, and not with the intent of curing the cancer._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._Having no signs or symptoms of disease._The period of time during which something continues._Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone._Treatment with corticosteroid drugs to reduce swelling, pain, and other symptoms of inflammation._Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any radiation treatment done with the intent to relieve symptoms and reduce the suffering caused by the cancer, and not with the intent of curing the cancer.

Concepts.definition: Any radiation treatment done with the intent to relieve symptoms and reduce the suffering caused by the cancer, and not with the intent of curing the cancer.

Property.preferredName: Timepoint Asymptomatic Duration Without Steroid Therapy Maintenance Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.:Having no signs or symptoms of disease.:The period of time during which something continues.:Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.:Treatment with corticosteroid drugs to reduce swelling, pain, and other symptoms of inflammation.:Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
Without clinical signs or indications that raise the possibility of a particular disorder or dysfunction.
The period of time during which something continues.
Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
The use of exogenous steroids for the treatment of any disease or disorder.
Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has received palli
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received palliative radiation for brain metastases, has patient been asymptomatic for at least 4 weeks without use of maintenance steroid therapy, and last received radiation at least 4 weeks prior to proposed start of therapy?
